geolibrary

Geo library (pyrit.toolbox.geolibrary)

This module contains a collection of Geo-objects.

Primitive Geos

FoilWinding([name, origin_x, origin_y, ...])

Model of foil windings in a 2D geometry.

Yoke([name, origin_x, origin_y, origin_z, ...])

Model of a Yoke with or without air gap in 2D.

Complex Geos

They consist of other Geos

FoilWindingWithSurrounding(foil_winding[, ...])

Model of foil windings in a 2D geometry with a surrounding.

PotInductor(windings, yoke, name, origin_x, ...)

Model representing a pot inductor.
